summary: Clipeum has got into Skyrim and he has survived a dragon attack in Helgen. Ralof helped him escape. This mod contains Spartan Armor Set, Spartan Shield, Spear and Sword!
descriptionHtml:
Fresh out of Helgen Keep, Clipeum is the master of shields and one-handed swords! He sometimes uses his bow for distractions so he can flank enemies with his shield.

I suggest you get Clipeum the house in Solitude. Plenty of storage and mannequins.

I will upload more save games once in awhile, I mean more advanced ones like after completing the Imperials Quest Line and so on.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
His stats are:

Smithing 20
Heavy Armor 25
Block 35
One-Handed 35
Archery 25
The rest of the skills are at 15.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Required mods:

There is already the required mod into the file!
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Recommended mods:

Spartan Race by Jambii1987
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17563

Extensible Follower Framework by Expired6978
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12933

More Muscular Men by WolverineHowlett
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4145
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Installation:

1) To enable the "Data Files" option in the Skyrim Launcher, add this line:
bEnableFileSelection=1 , under the [Launcher] line.
to
My DocumentsMy GamesSkyrimSkyrimPrefs.ini file

1a) More detailed explanation:
Under the [Launcher]; you will see there are many other things between brackets, like: [LODS], [Display], etc. Exactly under the line that says [Launcher] type the thing I mentioned earlier. I suggest to backup the file (make a copy of it).

2) Copy the save game,but only the save game into you save game folder, that should look like this: "Libraries/Documents/My games Skyrim/Saves", and the SpartanV10 files into you Skyrim Data Folder.(The data folder path should vary from person to person)

3) Into the launcher click on the "Data Files" button and then click on all the things that contain the word SpartanV10

Please check if you respected the steps before asking why it doesn't work!
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
How to fix:

If this mod doesn't work get this .BSA Unpacker and unpack the textures from Vlad550077's mod and copy them in your Data folder (do not delete the original unpacked .BSA file). This thing works on all mods that have invisible items or that behave weird.
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4804
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Permission:

Message me for permission to use this save game on your mod or to use Clipeum on any other mods/save games.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Credits:

Vlad550077's
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13692

Bethesda for making the game so awesome.
My brain for it's creativity.
You because you checked this out!
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Enjoy the save game! Hope you like! Endorse and Comment!
author: Anubirus
